title: i cant update the game
body: its written error 0004 and i dont know how to solve this probleme can you guys help me

replies.body: The error 004 message is the updated version's way of saying, "hey, there's a connection problem!"  Basically, your network is failing to reach our services, so it can't update or get in.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up!  Hopefully, that helps.
